body_html: But shouldn't this stay open then? I mean, if we agree that there is a change needed, the change should be done some day eventually. When the ticket is closed, nobody will remember it and thus it will never be changed.
body_text: But shouldn't this stay open then? I mean, if we agree that there is a change needed, the change should be done some day eventually. When the ticket is closed, nobody will remember it and thus it will never be changed.
body: But shouldn't this stay open then? I mean, if we agree that there is a change needed, the change should be done some day eventually. When the ticket is closed, nobody will remember it and thus it will never be changed.
